text: Build quality: The sleek and smooth silver plastic design is very beautiful to look at. I am a student so performance was more than enough for me since I rarely play games on my laptop. Felt high performance to me. The in-built fan was very much able to keep the temperature and heating in control. But I would highly recommend anyone buying any laptop to buy a laptop stand. Believe me it will extend the battery life and overall performance quality by a lot. Weight feels negligible. Quite portable in fact. Overall I would most definitely say, Value for money Read more
